```{r}
auc_list <- readRDS(file = "auc2.RDS")
auc_mat <- do.call(cbind, auc_list)
auc_mat
```

```{r}
row.names(auc_mat) <- c('Wilcoxon', 'Likelihood Ratio', 'ROC Analysis', 't-Test', 'Negative Binomial', 'Poisson', 'Logistic Regression', 'DESeq2', 'MAST', 'MAST +', 'Negative Binomial +', 'Poisson +', 'Logistic Regression +', 'Van Elteren (Wilcoxon +)')
```


```{r}
#rowMeans(auc_mat)
auc_sd <- rowSds(auc_mat)
names(auc_sd) <- names(rowMeans(auc_mat))

t(rbind(round(rowMeans(auc_mat), 3), round(auc_sd * 3, 3)))
```

```{r}
x = paste(round(rowMeans(auc_mat), 3), round(auc_sd * 3, 3), sep = "\\pm")
x = paste0("$", x, "$")
names(x) = names(auc_sd)
as.data.frame(x)
```


```{r}
auc_df <- stack(as.data.frame(t(auc_mat)))
colnames(auc_df) <- c("AUC", "Test")
auc_df
```

```{r}
ggplot(auc_df, aes(x=Test, y=AUC)) + geom_boxplot() + coord_flip() + theme_classic()
```

```{r}
pdf('roc-summary.pdf', height = 3, width = 4)
ggplot(auc_df, aes(x=Test, y=AUC)) + geom_boxplot() + coord_flip() + theme_classic()
dev.off()
```
